content: Guess what? I landed a gig at a blockchain startup. The team uses AI coding assistants, and I'm diving in headfirst. Feels like I'm finally in my element. Here we go!
Feeling a bit older and wiser at 22. Got a new job in blockchain, started a blog, and even taught my family about digital identity. Life's a whirlwind, but I'm here for it.
Met this girl on an AI dating app. We connected over our love for blockchain. It's like the tech chose her for me. Maybe algorithms do know us better than we think.
